title: Textile, 16th–17th century
inscribed:
Kufic insrcitions which when translated are; (A) There is no god except Allah. Muhammad is the prophjet of God (repeated)
(B) Say: He is God alone: God the Eternal! He begetteth not and is not begotten; And there is none like unto him
(C) Allah (repeated) Muhammad (repeated)
(D) truly we have given thee an abundance; Pary therefore to the Lord, and slay the victims. Verily whoso hateth thee shall be childless.
description: Funerary textile with zigzag bands of Kufic script in red and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 16th–17th century.
16th–17th century. Medium: silk
Technique; woven. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-381.
